episodes.title: IG Kanja Steps In as Shakahola Cult Investigations Intensify
episodes.description: Inspector General of Police Douglas Kanja has arrived at the Binzaro cult grave site in Kilifi County, where journalists have been barred from accessing the scene. The move comes amid heightened investigations into the deaths linked to controversial preacher Paul Mackenzie.

episodes.title: Fresh human remains unearthed in graves near Shakahola
episodes.description: Fresh human remains unearthed in graves near Shakahola

episodes.title: Kitur Links Shakahola Deaths to Organ Harvesting, Calls for Fresh Probe
episodes.description:
Nandi Hills MP Benard Kitur has sparked fresh controversy over the Shakahola cult deaths, calling for new investigations and suggesting a possible link to illegal organ harvesting.
Speaking in Kapsabet, Kitur dismissed previous reports as insufficient and hinted at a wider cover-up. His remarks come amid allegations connecting Mediheal Hospitals, linked to Dr. Swarup Mishra, to organ trafficking — claims that recently drew deportation threats from Health CS Aden Duale.

episodes.title: Kitur claims Shakahola massacre links to an organ harvesting ring
episodes.description: Nandi Hills MP Benard Kitur has ignited a new political firestorm by demanding a fresh investigation into the Shakahola cult deaths, dramatically linking the tragedy to an alleged illegal organ harvesting syndicate.
